Module io.jstach.ezkv.kvs
Package io.jstach.ezkv.kvs

Interface KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder

All Superinterfaces:
KeyValuesServiceProvider
All Known Subinterfaces:
KeyValuesMedia
All Known Implementing Classes:
DotEnvKeyValuesMedia, JSON5KeyValuesMedia, XMLKeyValuesMedia
Enclosing interface:
KeyValuesServiceProvider
public static non-sealed interface KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder extends KeyValuesServiceProvider
A service provider interface for finding KeyValuesMedia implementations based on various attributes such as file extensions, media types, and URIs.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.jstach.ezkv.kvs.KeyValuesServiceProvider

  • Method Details

    • findByResource

      default Optional<KeyValuesMedia> findByResource(KeyValuesResource resource)
      Finds a KeyValuesMedia based on the attributes of a given KeyValuesResource.
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource for which to find the media type
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the media if found, or empty if not

    • findByExt

      Optional<KeyValuesMedia> findByExt(String ext)
      Finds a KeyValuesMedia based on a file extension.
      Parameters:
      ext - the file extension (e.g., "properties")
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the media if found, or empty if not

    • findByMediaType

      Finds a KeyValuesMedia based on a media type string.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      an Optional containing the media if found, or empty if not

    • findByUri

      Optional<KeyValuesMedia> findByUri(URI uri)
      Finds a KeyValuesMedia based on a URI.
      Parameters:
      uri - the URI to analyze
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the media if found, or empty if not
